metadata.defaultDescription: Green Wall is a GitHub contribution graph generator.

metadata.shareOgDescription: I just made a GitHub contributions graph in review!
metadata.aboutDescription: Learn about Green Wall - a GitHub contribution graph generator that helps you review and share your coding journey.
metadata.aboutOgDescription: Learn how Green Wall helps you visualize and share your GitHub contributions.
metadata.yearOgDescription: Explore {username}'s GitHub activity and contribution statistics for {year}.

home.title: Review the contributions you have made on GitHub over the years.

share.headline: Generated my GitHub graph with GreenWall

graph.newYearText: Happy New Year  Go make the first contribution !

about.goalContent: Our goal is to make it easy for people to look back on their GitHub contributions over the years and share their achievements on social media and beyond.
about.howItWorksContent: This project leverages the GitHub GraphQL API to retrieve contribution data and utilizes Next.js API routes to process requests. For more details on our data handling practices, you can check out the
about.supportContent: Want to show your support for this project? You can star on <github>GitHub</github> or vote on <productHunt>Product Hunt</productHunt>, or you can share this website elsewhere!
about.reportingIssuesContent: Got bugs or have any suggestions for this project? Welcome to leave your message on the <link>GitHub issues</link>.
